name: oQQur
slogan: An app for guides to broadcast their tours live, in 360 degrees
description:
oQQur is a web, and mobile app for real-time video tours. Guides broadcast, monetize, take questions and requests from their virtual group.

The service is built around streaming from 360 cameras, though tour guides will be able to use traditional video as well. Users can chat with each other and the guide. The app allows tipping and we will implement paid events as well.

There are potentially different content creator personas to pursue such as tabletop games, video blogger private streams, podcast creators, and disaster surveys.

jobs.title: Co-founder CTO
jobs.description:
Looking for a hands on, data driven tech lead, willing to work on a project for high usage mobile and web, live video streaming app. 

Mission: build the infrastructure for next generation of live streamers, to help them find their voice, build an Audience and make a living. 

Key responsibilities: 
1) product decisions 
2) tech stack decisions(usage of existing code or implementation of own solution) 
3) leading and building a team

Key Values: 
1) make deductions based on what users want. Hunt data and translate to product features 
2) short dev cycles. 2 week sprints of small feature sets that move the needle for the KPI
3) willing to participate in customer support. Not because there are many tickets, but because it gives plenty of information. 
4) community driven
5) dedicated. 

Next earlies plans are:
Run 10 tours
Aim 10% weekly growth
Test early revenue
Measure retention
Fundraise

pure equity position.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Looking for a hands on, data driven tech lead, willing to work on a project for high usage mobile and web, live video streaming app.

Mission: build the infrastructure for next generation of live streamers, to help them find their voice, build an Audience and make a living.

Key responsibilities:
1) product decisions
2) tech stack decisions(usage of existing code or implementation of own solution)
3) leading and building a team

Key Values:
1) make deductions based on what users want. Hunt data and translate to product features
2) short dev cycles. 2 week sprints of small feature sets that move the needle for the KPI
3) willing to participate in customer support. Not because there are many tickets, but because it gives plenty of information.
4) community driven
5) dedicated.

Next earlies plans are:
Run 10 tours
Aim 10% weekly growth
Test early revenue
Measure retention
Fundraise

pure equity position.

jobs.title: Community and Marketing intern
jobs.description:
Are you looking to get ahead of the curve and jump on board for one of the most exciting social media products to come? 

Our mission is to help rasie the first wave of 360 degree live streamers, help them find their voice and make sustanable living, doing what they love. 

As a high acheiver you will learn:
1) How to build and test hypothses around markting channels and communciations. 
2) Processes, tools and frameworks to improve performance
3) How to find voice of the brand
4) Make media assets that convert

Objectives: 
Bridge the gap between product team and users, through monitoring and facilitating communication on community portal, as well as create and tailor the messaging tone and channels. 

You:
Have great english writing skills. 
Relentless will to improve.
Not only want to be guided, but take your own risk into learning and experimenting. 
Love social media and want to learn the mechanics behind virality and engagemnet. 

Skills and interests: 
1) podcasts 
2) live streams 
3) blog posts 
4) communication with community

This is an unpaid position that could lead to fulltime
